verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Peace, perfect peace, in this dark world of sin? The blood of Jesus whispers peace within.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Peace, perfect peace, with sorrows surging round? On Jesus' bosom naught but calm is found.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Peace, perfect peace, our future all unknown? Jesus we know, and He is on the throne.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Peace, perfect peace, death shadowing us and ours? Jesus has vanquished death and all its powers.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: It is enough: earth's struggles soon shall cease, And Jesus, call us to heaven's perfect peace. Amen.
